trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> evento ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> está definida ou seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> é de propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: Manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> evento é útil quando você quiser determinar o erro para uma linha, dependendo de seu estado e os valores que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando você processa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> eventos e especifique o texto de erro no manipulador de um glifo de erro é exibida no cabeçalho da linha, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário move o ponteiro do mouse sobre o glifo de erro, o texto de erro é exibida em uma dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> evento também ocorre sempre que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade é recuperada.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a row, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> propriedade para determinar o estado ou o valor de uma linha e use essas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é inicializada com o valor da linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> propriedade, que substitui o valor do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> eventos ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar as penalidades de desempenho de definir a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> valor para várias linhas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error text for the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto do erro para a linha.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the error text for the row.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o texto de erro para a linha.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, essa propriedade contém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade se ele tiver sido definido para uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property value displays as a ToolTip for the error glyph in the row header.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> exibe o valor da propriedade como uma dica de ferramenta do glifo de erro no cabeçalho da linha.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property in an event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> propriedade em um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Although the code actually uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, this property is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Embora o código realmente usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, essa propriedade é praticamente idêntica ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row that raised the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a linha que gerou o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero based row index for the row.
trans-unit.target: O linha baseada em índice zero para a linha.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.
